message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice! I really appreciate it, but I'm hoping to get a better deal.  I'd be willing to pay $9500 for the product. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I'm still hoping to get a good price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on 10500?
